definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Hispanic senators have been few and far between, as have Hispanic governors.
sentences.chinese: 西語裔的參議員和州長更是鳳毛麟角。

sentences.english: WPL in China: the past and the future.
sentences.chinese: 西語哲在中國不遠的過去與當前。

sentences.english: I never got to perform Shakira's songs in college.
sentences.chinese: 大學時我沒有機會表演一首夏奇拉的西語歌。

sentences.english: When will Trump begin deporting Hispanics?
sentences.chinese: 特朗普什麼時候開始驅逐西語裔？

sentences.english: "Amigos para siempre" means "friends for life" in Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 歌名在西語中意爲“一生的朋友”。

sentences.english: This paper addresses the problem of ancient Chinese poetry translation.
sentences.chinese: 從西語研究的角度，談古詩詞翻譯。

sentences.english: This characteristic makes Spanish one of the easiest languages to learn.
sentences.chinese: 這種特性使得西語成爲的最簡單的西方語言。

definition: When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
